top.title: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
top.summary: The US Department of Justice faces criticism from victims after names and unredacted images included in latest release.

top.title: US says it shot down Iranian drone flying towards aircraft carrier
top.summary: A US military spokesman says the drone was shot down while approaching an American vessel in the Arabian Sea.

top.title: Saif al-Islam Gaddafi, son of ex-Libyan leader, reportedly shot dead
top.summary: The 53-year-old, who was once widely seen as the second most powerful person in Libya, was killed on Tuesday according to Libyan media.

top.title: Netflix and Warner Bros struggle to defend merger
top.summary: Concerns were raised by a subcommittee including potential price rises and the future of cinemas.

top.title: Pinterest sacks workers for creating tool to track layoffs
top.summary: The social media platform recently announced that it was axing around 15% of its workforce.

top.title: X offices raided in France as UK opens fresh investigation into Grok
top.summary: Elon Musk's X and Grok platforms are facing increased scrutiny from authorities on both sides of the channel.

title.#text: Republicans haul Netflix before Congress for being too ‘woke’
AMD hints Microsoft could launch its next-gen Xbox in 2027
